name: fetchEvent(forTask:occurrence:callbackQueue:completion:)
desc: Fetches a single occurrence of a specific task asynchronously from the store.
declaration: func fetchEvent(forTask task: OCKTask, occurrence: Int, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue = .main, completion: @escaping (Result<OCKEvent<OCKTask, OCKOutcome>, OCKStoreError>) -> Void)
